title: Project-Based Natural Water Resource Education Module

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic scientific concepts and general interest in environmental issues
context.additional_context: Supplemental use of smartphone-based digital collaboration tools in limited-technology environments

learning_goals: A 3D terrain model creatively designed and implemented to explain the water cycle process.
Local community water resource issues can be analyzed, and project-based solutions proposed.
Physical/digital outputs can be produced by dividing roles with team members in a collaborative learning environment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
